## Change Gate (WBGL) - Required

Every PR must be traceable to the master plan and comparison evidence.

### PLAN-REF
Link to the exact section in `Docs/WBGL_MASTER_UPGRADE_PLAN.md`.

### GAP-REF
Link to one or more comparison files:
- `Docs/FINAL_MISSING_FEATURES_MATRIX_WBGL_BG.md`
- `Docs/final_missing_features_matrix.json`
- `Docs/WBGL_BG_Full_Feature_Census.md`
- `Docs/differential_analysis.md`

GAP-REF:

### Final Checklist
- [ ] PLAN-REF and GAP-REF are present and valid.
- [ ] I mapped affected layers.
- [ ] I added rollback and test evidence.
- [ ] I updated documentation for sensitive changes.
- [ ] I reviewed compatibility impact on existing workflow.
